arStrings.szText:
{c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to create an {c_important}Arrow Storm{/c} where it explodes, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. 

Your {c_important}Arrow Storms{/c} continuously apply {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
